responses: i am sorry salvi insta pr itna bhasan likhne ke liye hum achhe dost hai or achhe dost he rahenge lekin ye baat krna band na kro please  agar sorry accept kr liya ho to ok type kr do

wese kl kyo  dimag kharav tha tumhara itne call kiye ek na uthayi tum na back ki iska ans whatsaap pr dene ok byy app se baat krke achha laga kripya hamari service ko rate kare 1 , 2, 3, mai rate jarur kare
ni matlab 3 star dene mai hath kharav ho jayenge tum badal gyi salvi km se km 2  star he dedo
ni matlab 3 star dene mai hath kharav ho jayenge tum badal gyi salvi  you are changed
